provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Registered Stock (Appoint-
ment of Registrar) Order, 1964.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The Bank of Jamaica is hereby appointed Registrar under the
Act.
